nvm what i posted, i did a bit more browsing on 28 days later and ive learned that the movie was shot by a camcorder so the quality is by no means the uploaders fault

Second one looks great. First one looks good too but has the aftercredits CUT OFF... And there's a very annoying framedrop at the very beginning when Jimmy is yelling "hello!". For anyone wondering... The 28 Days Later + 28 Weeks Later torrent is basically the same. So if framedrops annoy you. Avoid.
